name: Afternoon Tee
description:
Note - There is a Unity bug causing the game to crash seemingly randomly. If it happens, please reload the page and it should go away.

A physics golf game with a twist - you have to control 2 balls!

Use WASD or Arrows to move the blue golf ball which is tethered to the red one. Release to let it smack one into the other and send them both flying. Try to get to the end of each level in either the Par mode or Time Attack mode.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together"

Art and Music created by Spongebosch
